wikipedia_page.main: Archibald Beveridge Paterson (13 July 1908 – 1995) was a Scottish footballer who played in the Scottish League for Dunfermline Athletic, Forfar Athletic and Montrose as a wing half.

response: Paterson was the son of football manager Sandy Paterson and played under his father's management at Cowdenbeath. He had a half brother Archie Paterson who was also a footballer. He served as a gunner in the Royal Field Artillery during the First World War and served overseas before being demobbed in 1919.
